title: The Peake Uprising & Death of Maekar
description:
An offshoot of the Blackfyre conflicts that took the life of King Maekar and several other important nobles. This led to Egg's crowning and  several other conflicts, and serves as a strong parallel for what's  happening with Stannis in the North. With guest Steven Attewell.

Steven - racefortheironthrone.wordpress.com
Nina - goodqueenaly.tumblr.com
